head.title: File:Ishi glyph.svg - The Coppermind - 17th Shard

body.class: mediawiki ltr sitedir-ltr mw-hide-empty-elt ns-6 ns-subject mw-editable page-File_Ishi_glyph_svg rootpage-File_Ishi_glyph_svg skin-vector action-view skin-vector-legacy minerva--history-page-action-enabled

div.div: Size of this preview: 510 × 538 pixels. Other resolution: 227 × 240 pixels.

div.p: Original file ‎(SVG file, nominally 510 × 538 pixels, file size: 8 KB)
The glyph ishi, one of the Ten Fundamental Glyphs. It is associated with the Essence Sinew, the Herald Ishar, the divine attributes of Pious and Guiding , as well as the Order of Bondsmiths.
Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:51, 16 October 2021
Thumbnail for version as of 20:13, 26 June 2021

tr.td: The retracing has been done using the following file from the Digital Art Package of The Way of Kings Leatherbound Kickstarter: 10_Bondsmith_Hrz_v10.jpg The following software was used: Vector Magic (https://vectormagic.com/): To convert the file into an SVG and major shape tweaks. Boxy SVG (https://boxy-svg.com/): To remove backgrounds and other layers. Inkscape (https://inkscape.org/): Color correction, cropping, and minor edits.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 03:57, 16 June 2020
Thumbnail for version as of 20:18, 12 June 2020
Thumbnail for version as of 19:20, 24 October 2013

tr.td: The glyph for the Surgebinding order associated with Ishar drawn for ''The Stormlight Archive''. Drawn by Isaac Stewart and traced by [http://www.17thshard.com/forum/user/135-cuaiir/ Cuaiir]. Category: Stormlight Archive[[Category...

div.p: The following 7 pages use this file:
This file contains additional information, probably added from the digital camera or scanner used to create or digitize it.
If the file has been modified from its original state, some details may not fully reflect the modified file.
